results.name: Crescent (Andrea Schöniger, Francisco Carrasco Girbés, Agus12, ClaudiaSchoniger)
A Carol of Ruin and Prosperity

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon / NVIDIA Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

results.name: In the Depths of This Dungeon - Demo
Yonder World: Interview with the Void

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows: 7/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series (With 1GB memory allocation)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 1920x1080
